scripts.package: rm -rf dist && npm run build && cp -R build dist && pkg . --output dist/image-url-checker
scripts.publish:major: npm run package && git add dist && git commit -m 'Package a new binary' && npm version major && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish:minor: npm run package && git add dist && git commit -m 'Package a new binary' && npm version minor && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish:patch: npm run package && git add dist && git commit -m 'Package a new binary' && npm version patch && npm publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.test: npm run build && npm start -- -o short.log data/short.csv
